text_block_list.text:
Starting now, the days of racing through 
the Twinkle Series with the Uma Musume in 
charge will begin. And the name of the girl 
I'm walking it with is――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes, this is Sakura Bakushin O!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
As class president, I intend on Bakushin-ing 
all my races!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And furthermore, I will win every G1 race 
and set an example for Uma Musume 
everywhere! 
What an honor-student-like idea! I'm afraid 
of my own brilliant mind! 
my own !

And so began <chrname>'s attempt at the 
Twinkle Series!
